transmo.imb.desc:
You can make and change potions with the smithing table, a costlier but more flexible alternative to brewing. 

It will require the base to have potion effect data, it will accept any ingredient or potion. 

Potion tier material is blaze powder.
transmo.eng.desc:
You can apply extra upgrades on your gear with the smithing table. 

Based on the trimming system, runes are used to give flat attribute increases and ingredients for tiers. 

The upgrades work independently from standard data and can be replaced freely.
transmo.eng.trim.coast.desc: Provides +1.2% Fall Damage Reduction per Tier.
transmo.ins.desc:
You can apply custom data on your gear with the smithing table. 

Similar to enchanted books for the anvil, scrolls are used as base for the smithing table.
transmo.ins.flow.desc: Applicable on armor: helmet, chestplate, leggings, boots.
transmo.ins.pig.desc: Applicable on golden armor and tools.
transmo.ins.skull.desc: Applicable on tools: sword, axe, pickaxe, shovel, hoe.
transmo.base.desc:
Welcome to TransmoCrafter, a datapack that makes the smithing table a true tool for progression. 

To make it more relevant, the smithing table recipe was changed from requiring iron ingots to any stone material. 

Some recipes were tweaked and all the vanilla recipes for items now craft unbreakable items.
transmo.sd.desc:
You can extract and apply custom data on the smithing table using nether stars as template or base. 

Bypass any tier or gear limitation to transfer custom data. 

Extracting uses soul sand as tier material.
transmo.tc.chain.desc: Leather armor can be upgraded into chainmail armor by using chains as template.
transmo.tc.dia.a.desc: Iron armor can be upgraded into diamond armor by using diamonds as template.
transmo.tc.dia.t.desc: Iron tools can be upgraded into diamond tools by using diamonds as template.
transmo.tc.flint.desc:
Iron tools can be upgraded into a flint and steel by using a flint as template. 

It can't be upgraded further, counts as iron tool tier.
transmo.tc.gold.a.desc:
Leather armor can be upgraded into golden armor by using gold ingots as template. 

It can't be upgraded further.
transmo.tc.gold.t.desc:
Stone tools can be upgraded into golden tools by using gold ingots as template. 

They can't be upgraded further.
transmo.tc.iron.a.desc: Chainmail armor can be upgraded into iron armor by using iron ingots as template.
transmo.tc.iron.t.desc: Stone tools can be upgraded into iron tools by using iron ingots as template.
transmo.tc.root.desc: The root of the upgrade tree. Has to be crafted.
transmo.craft.desc:
You can use various templates and tier materials to upgrade your gear on the smithing table. 

Transfer the custom data while increasing the tier to keep items relevant as you progress.
transmo.tc.seed.desc:
Wheat seeds can be upgraded into iron leggings by using iron ingots as template. 

The origins.
transmo.tc.shield.desc:
Shields can be upgraded into an iron chestplate by using iron ingots as template. 

Walking fortress.
transmo.tc.stone.desc: Wooden tools can be upgraded into stone tools by using any cobblestone as template.
transmo.tc.trid.desc:
Diamond tools can be upgraded into a trident by using a heart of the sea as template. 

It can't be upgraded further, counts as diamond tool tier.
transmo.tc.turt.desc:
Iron helmets can be upgraded into a turtle shell by using turtle scute as template. 

It can't be upgraded further, counts as iron armor tier.
transmo.tg.armor.desc:
Any armor piece of the same tier can be changed into another by using the new shape as template. 

Armor pieces being helmets, chestplates, leggings and boots.
transmo.tg.bow.desc: Any bow or crossbow can be changed into each other by using the new shape as template.
transmo.graft.desc:
You can modify the shape of your gear on the smithing table. 

Transfer the custom data while picking the most suitable form for your items.
transmo.tg.tools.desc:
Any tool of the same tier can be changed into another by using the new shape as template. 

Tools being swords, axes, pickaxes, shovels and hoes.
item.minecraft.piglin_banner_pattern.des: Applicable on golden armor and tools.
